column2: Question
Concentration
I am concentrated when playing the game
Goal Clarity
It was easy to understand the goal of the game
Feedback
It is easy to understand when I do something wrong in the game
It is easy to understand when I do something good in the game
I liked the graphics of the game
I liked the sounds of the game
Challenge
I get bored when playing the game
The game was too easy
The game was adequately difficult
The game was too hard
My skill gradually improved when playing the game
Autonomy
I felt in control of the movements of the player
I could recover from errors I made in the game
Immersion
Time goes by fast when plaing the game
I become unaware of my surroundings when playing the game
Social Interaction
I was competing with others to reach the furthest
It was important to communicate when playing the game
It was important to cooperate when playing the game
I cooperated well with the other player
The other player cooperated well with me
Game Enjoyment
I enjoyed playing the game
I would like to play this game at home
